Events that occurred on 2 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1924 - Voice actor Theodore Bikel is born.
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Miss Turnbull.
1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 302.
1970 - J.R.R. Tolkien is awarded an honorary Doctorate of Letters by the University of Nottingham.
1981 - Amon Hen 50 is published.
1995 - Voice actor Michael Hordern dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2942:
Bilbo wakes up in Rivendell before dawn. The Elves are singing loud and clear under his open window.
